title: Dance in the primary school
creator_credit: Derek Monk, Freelance Directors and Schools Council
brief_description: Shows what can be achieved with children of different ages and varying ability and experience. Illustrates the framework of a lesson; some stimuli used to initiate movement - voice, percussion, pictures; how several teachers, drawing on their own resources enrich the children’s experience; ways to extend children in the main part of the lesson; development of a simple group dance.
